name: Alice Language Study #19
full_description: Alice, a beautiful 20-year-old blonde woman with long wavy hair and green eyes, accompanied by her loyal green parrot companion with a red beak in scholarly long-sleeved attire, engaged in language study. Her parrot observes the learning process. Focused anime study environment.
location: Study space with books, resources, and focused learning environment
style_notes: Anime style with scholarly atmosphere, cloudy study lighting
props: Books, notes, laptop, learning materials, comfortable seating
